column4: Anyone know what this is & how to fix it? files list file for package `totem-gstreamer' contains empty filename
Trying to apt-get anything at all
oh, your apt-get's config file and database file might be corrupted
i had some bad stuff like that happening and my apt-get would not install anything
dont remember what i did to fix it
OK, anyone know how he would have fixed?

oh, try and remove the package it nags?
